subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] A few questions
msgSnippet: ... I m one of those who created a font for Quikscript (QS). Feel free to ask me any questions you want. Paul
messageBody:
Robin Franzen wrote:
> Hi my name is Robin. I stumbled over this source via the internet. I got very interested in this alphabet
> and especially the aspect of saving space. I'm currently looking for a subject for my MA-project in graphic design.
> I have two questions:
> – I would very much get intouch with people who have designed fonts using this alphabet.
> – Has there been any adaptation of the alphabet for scandinavian languages, such as swedish, norwegian or danish?
>
>
I'm one of those who created a font for Quikscript (QS). Feel free to
ask me any questions you want.

Paul
